page.title: 16EATING AND DRINKING
page.content: {AWLISCOMBE INN}200YR OLD VILLAGE PUB. RECENTLY EXTENSIVELY MODERNISED. HAS FACILITIES FOR VARIOUS SIZE PARTIES & FUNCTIONS.5 STAFF. GRILLS & SNACKS. {OTTER INN}350YR OLD PUB ON BANKS OF R.OTTER AT WESTON. OPEN PUB HOURS. CAMPING/CARAVANNING ON 1 ACRE OF LAND. FOOD:- SNACKS- FULL MEALS. The following establishments are in Honiton High Street:-{HILLSIDE CAFE} 200YR OLD BUILDING. OPEN DAY ONLY. LOCAL CUSTOM.{DOMINOES}200YR OLD BUILDING RECENTLY EXTENSIVELY MODERNISED.10 STAFF. OPEN 12HRS. MAINLY FOREIGN DISHES,EXTENSIVE RANGE. {WHITE LION}385YR OLD PUB.LOCAL CUSTOM. SOCIAL FACILITIES,DARTS ETC.BAR SNACKS & SOME MEALS {VOLUNTEER}450YR OLD PUB- THATCHED. LOCAL CUSTOM.SNACK FOODS. {RAINBOW CAFE}100YR OLD BUILDING.SMALL TOWN CAFE OFFERING SOFT DRINKS, SNACKS GRILLS.
